Lists the necessary settings for building and deploying _tll_ projects.

= eclipse =
The following steps cover the necessary [http://www.eclipse.org/ eclipse] IDE workspace settings for the _tll_ projects.


== Classpath Variables ==
The following _Preferences -> Java -> Build Path -> *Classpath Variables*_ are required:
  * TLL_ROOT - Points to the root dir of the _tll_ source tree.

== User Libraries ==
The following _Preferences -> Java -> Build Path -> *User Libraries*_ are required for building the tll-util, tll-config and tll-mail projects and represent the necessary dependencies:
